Fetching package metadata ...........

body:
@mrry  distutils is now obsolete and not in the Anaconda channels.

```
c:\ProgramData\Anaconda3>conda install distutils
Fetching package metadata ...........
PackageNotFoundError: Package missing in current win-64 channels:
  - distutils
```
